job_tasks.phrase: design, build and continuously improve the clients online platform

This describes the act of putting new technological solutions into practice within a software development context.

job_tasks.phrase: Take responsibility for the resiliency and availability of different products
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring resiliency and availability of products falls under the umbrella of operations and system reliability, which is a key aspect of MLOps in managing production systems.
